  • Method Details

    • isSpecial

      public boolean isSpecial()
      isSpecial() returns true if the stock component is special, false otherwise

    • addResource

      public void addResource(ResourceType resource) throws Exception
      addResource() is used to add a new resource to the component, only if the current number of resources is below the maximum, otherwise an exception is thrown. If the stock component is special then all kinds of cubes are allowed, if not it will not be possible to add red cubes.
      Specified by:
      addResource in class StorageComponent
      Parameters:
      resource - is the resource wa want to add in the stock component
      Throws:
      Exception - if the stock component is already full or if a red cube is added to a non-special stock component

    • getTotalResource

      public int getTotalResource()
      getTotalResource() returns the number of chests on the component
      Specified by:
      getTotalResource in class StorageComponent

    • isThereTypeObject

      public boolean isThereTypeObject(ResourceTypes type)

    • isFull

      public boolean isFull()
      returns true if all the slots in the Stock are occupied by a cube

      Specified by:
      getMaxCapacity in class StorageComponent

    • getStock

      public List<ResourceType> getStock()

    • getValueOfStock

      public int getValueOfStock()
      getValueOfStock() returns the values' sum of all the cubes on the stock component
